educations.program: Bachelor of Computing and Financial Management, Honours Co-op Program

awards.name: Best Financial Hack & Best Data Visualization Hack
awards.description: Build Finalytic at PennApps 2016 won the best financial hack sponsored by BlackRock and best data visualization hack sponsored by Qualtric.

awards.name: 2nd Place in Data Visualization Hack
awards.description: Build a project to display entity related data in a timeline UI design. This project is implemented with an AngularJS frontend and C# API during the DBRS Data Visualization Hackathon.

awards.contest: BC Senior High School Tennis Provincials 2013
awards.name: 3rd Place in BC Provincials
awards.description: Represent Shawnigan Lake High Schoool to BC Tennis Provincials and get 3rd place out of top 12 selected school across BC.

awards.name: Honorable Mention
awards.description: Represent Cowichan Valley District to BC Performing Arts Provincials and get honorable mention in Senior Violin category.

awards.name: Honorable Mention
awards.description: Top 2% in Canada out of 15000 participants.

summary: Created high-volume trading analytics tools for Fixed Income Derivatives that provided data-driven insights and hedging recommendations to traders and stakeholders
Developed multi-processing pricing models for convertible and equity swaps that used machine learning techniques to train based on credit risk, counterparty risk, and issuer risk
Built modern applications with cutting-edge technology following MicroServices architecture to continuously deliver high-quality and high-performance solutions at scale
Created high-performance credit rating and reporting tools that allowed 1k+ financial analysts to accelerate process of financial rating across North America
Built an ETL pipeline to extract data from 3rd Party API and Amazon S3 to ElasticSearch that is used by DBRS.com search engine to serve 100k+ users
Implemented document generation service that converted entity objects in JSON/XML format to various reporting documents for internal users and stakeholders
Architected ecommerce applications for product design and finance team to manage product design and specification, barcode generation, marketing strategies, and financial reports
Built a multi-threaded EDI process that centralized orders from various ecommerce platforms to reduce order processing time and improve internal control
Interacted with stakeholders and engineers to ensure software quality and performance, validity of requirements, and on-time delivery of nationwide projects in Canada
Implemented SQL stored procedures that resolved discrepancies between mock-up data and client's real data to validate reliability of data for QAs
Created an Intranet application used by 300+ employees with features of news publishing, employee management, meeting scheduling, and IT support requests
Assisted in building predictive models to forecast companyâ€™s wafer sales based on historical data and market demand with an accuracy of 90%

projects.name: Credit Card Fraud Detection
projects.description: Performed exploratory data analysis and applied statistical learning models such as random forest, support vector model, and generalized boosted model to identify fraudulent transactions.

projects.name: Finalytics
projects.description: Built a modern web application with Flask to visualize, analyze, and optimize portfolios with financial data provided from Yahoo Finance and BlackRock Aladdin API

projects.name: Supervised Breast Cancer Model
projects.description: Trained supervised model with University of Wisconsin Hospitals dataset using SciKit-learn, NumPy, and Pandas to diagnose patients with breast cancer with 97.5% accuracy

projects.name: TMX Options Trading Simulation
projects.description: Generated 15% return on a portfolio of derivatives securities over 3 months of timespan by applying Black-Scholes model and trading strategies such as butterfly spread, straddle, strangle, and hedging

recommendations.text: "Alex's performance exceeded our expectations at every turn. He quickly picked up ReactJS and worked as a full-stack developer, delivering three fully functional applications which will be used for day-to-day trading operations. Also, he works well independently and is able to quickly readjust when priorities changes. We have been impressed by both the quality of his work, and how much he was able to get done in less than four months."

"Current term was the second term Alex joined out team at DBRS. As with previous term Alex showed high level of professionalism and dependability. Throughout the term he worked on couple of critical deliverables with tight deadlines, as well as took part in research of experimental modules for our platform. I had a chance to personally work on the project with Alex during our end of the term hackathon / workathon, and was impressed with his ability to research complex systems independently and then work closely with the team to incorporate his findings with overall solution. He takes all the feedback he can get from our senior engineers and uses it to improve his technical skills, which tells me that he will be successful in any position in his future career."
recommendations.recommenderPosition: AVP of Global Technology, DBRS Inc.

recommendations.text: "Alex has been involved in creating a very complex web applications for e-commerce. He is very good at multi-tasking on various projects, and has been a great contributor to our ASHLIN team. His work has been well documented for the next student that will be joining us. The application that he has developed has an excellent user interface. He is always very thorough in creating it, and mindful of the users interaction with the application."

"Alex displayed excellent work ethic, was punctual and well-organized in completed his tasks, and proactively sought feedback and guidance to improve the qualify of his work. He showed willingness to follow instructions and was proactive in taking extra responsibilities to ensure deliverables are met."
recommendations.recommenderPosition: Manager of Solution Technology, BDO Canada.

recommendations.text: "Alex is a very positive and polite employee. He was able to participate and complete projects with high quality of code. Alex displayed his strong learning skills, as he was able to quickly pick up a new language and contribute to the team."
